maqras.text: nissandeh tumhaara rab jaanata hai ki tum lagabhag do tihaee raat, aadhee raat aur ek tihaee raat tak (namaaz mein) khade rahate ho, aur ek gironh un logon mein se bhee jo tumhaare saath hai, khada hota hai. aur allaah raat aur din kee ghat-badh niyat karata hai. use maaloom hai ki tum sab usaka nirvaah na kar sakoge, atah usane tumapar daya-drshti kee. ab jitana quraan aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo. use maaloom hai ki tumame se kuchh beemaar bhee honge, aur kuchh doosare log allaah ke udaar anugrah (rozee) ko dhoondhate hue dharatee mein yaatra karenge, kuchh doosare log allaah ke maarg mein yuddh karenge. atah usamen se jitana aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo, aur namaaz qaayam karo aur zakaat dete raho, aur allaah ko rn do, achchha rn. tum jo bhalaee bhee apane lie (aage) bhejoge use allaah ke yahaan atyuttam aur pratidaan kee drshti se bahut badhakar paoge. aur allaah se maafee maangate raho. beshak allaah atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
ai odhane lapetanevaale
utho, aur saavadhaan karane mein lag jao
aur apane rab kee badaee hee karo
apane daaman ko paak rakho
aur gandagee se door hee raho
apanee koshishon ko adhik samajhakar usake kram ko bhang na karo
aur apane rab ke lie dhairy hee se kaam lo
jab soor mein phoonk maaree jaegee
to jis din aisa hoga, vah din bada hee kathor hoga
inakaar karanevaalo par aasaan na hoga
chhod do mujhe aur usako jise mainne akela paida kiya
aur use maal diya door tak phaila hua
aur usake paas upasthit rahanevaale bete die
aur mainne usake lie achchhee tarah jeevan-maarg samatal kiya
phir vah lobh rakhata hai ki main usake lie aur adhik doonga
kadaapi nahin, vah hamaaree aayaton ka dushman hai
sheeghr hee main use gherakar kathin chadhaee chadhavaoonga
usane socha aur atakal se ek baat banaee
to vinasht ho, kaisee baat banaee
phir vinasht ho, kaisee baat banaee
phir nazar daudaee
phir tyoree chadhaee aur munh banaaya
phir peeth pheree aur ghamand kiya
antatah bola, "yah to bas ek jaadoo hai, jo pahale se chala aa raha hai
yah to maatr manushy kee vaanee hai.
main sheeghr hee use saqar (jahannam kee aag) mein jhonk doonga
aur tumhen kya pata kee saqar kya hai
vah na taras khaegee aur na chhodegee
khaal ko jhulasa denevaalee hai
usapar unnees (kaaryakarta) niyukt hai

aur hamane us aag par niyukt rahanevaalon ko farishte hee banaaya hai, aur hamane unakee sankhya ko inakaar karanevaalon ke lie museebat aur aazamaish hee banaakar rakha hai. taaki ve log jinhen kitaab pradaan kee gaee thee poorn vishvaas praapt karen, aur ve log jo eemaan le aae ve eemaan mein aur aage badh jaen. aur jin logon ko kitaab pradaan kee gaee ve aur eemaanavaale kisee sanshay me na pade, aur taaki jinake dilon me rog hai ve aur inakaar karanevaale kahen, "is varnan se allaah ka kya abhipraay hai?" is prakaar allaah jise chaahata hai pathabhrasht kar deta hai aur jise chaahata hain sammaarg pradaan karata hai. aur tumhaare rab kee senaon ko svayan usake siva koee nahin jaanata, aur yah to manushy ke lie maatr ek shiksha-saamagree hai
kuchh nahin, saakshee hai chaand
aur saakshee hai raat jabaki vah peeth pher chukee
aur praatahkaal jabaki vah poornaroopen prakaashit ho jae.
nishchay hee vah bhaaree (bhayankar) cheezon mein se ek hai
manushyon ke lie saavadhaanakarta ke roop mein
tumamen se us vyakti ke lie jo aage badhana ya peechhe hatana chaahe
pratyek vyakti jo kuchh usane kamaaya usake badale rehan (giravee) hai
sivaay daenvaalon ke
ve baagon mein honge, poochh-taachh kar rahe honge
aparaadhiyon ke vishay mein
tumhe kya cheez sakanr (jahannam) mein le aaee
ve kahenge, "ham namaaz ada karanevaalon mein se na the.
aur na ham muhataaj ko khaana khilaate the
aur vyarth baat aur kath-hujjatee mein pade rahanevaalon ke saath ham bhee usee mein lage rahate the.
aur ham badala die jaane ke din ko jhuthalaate the
yahaan tak ki vishvasaneey cheez (pralay-divas) mein hamen aa liya.
atah sifaarish karanevaalon ko koee sifaarish unako kuchh laabh na pahuncha sakegee
aakhir unhen kya hua hai ki ve naseehat se kataraate hai
maano ve bidake hue jangalee gadhe hai
jo sher se (darakar) bhaage hai
nahin, balki unamen se pratyek vyakti chaahata hai ki use khulee kitaaben dee jaen
kadaapi nahin, balki le aakhirat se darate nahin
kuchh nahin, vah to ek anusmati hai
ab jo koee chaahe isase naseehat haasil kare
aur ve naseehat haasil nahin karenge. yah aur baat hai ki allaah hee aisa chaahe. vahee is yogy hai ki usaka dar rakha jae aur is yogy bhee ki kshama kare
